snippet: There should be enough pumpkins for Halloween this year, but that might not be the case for the canned pumpkin used in pies come Thanksgiving.
abstract: Crop experts in Illinois say there could be shortage of canned pumpkin around Thanksgiving after rainfall in June washed out crop.
lead_paragraph: There should be enough pumpkins for Halloween this year, but that might not be the case for the canned pumpkin used in pies come Thanksgiving.

headline.main: Big Chunk of Canned Pumpkin May Not Make Thanksgiving
headline.print_headline: Big Chunk of Canned Pumpkin May Not Make Thanksgiving
